conbody.p: The (DSC) provides a web user interface for Data Stewards to resolve issues with records and possible matches when doing data matching. The DSC can be installed standalone or as part of a installation. It is used by for integrated and complex matching.

ul.li: It is a web application and is accessed via a web browser.
Hosted on Tomcat if standalone, or JBoss if with .
If installed with , it uses the authentication system and is a child application of .
If installed standalone, it provides basic user management via a file.
The web application server is typically run as a Service / Daemon.
